details: Introduced around a dozen AngularJS developers to React

projects.name: Messing Operations

details: Created Grafana dashboards to monitor throughput, analyze bottlenecks, and report metrics

details: Segmented the customer base through statistical analysis and machine learning using R

projects.name: VTeam

projects.name: Synthetic Lectins and Host-Guest Chemistry
projects.description: Studied the interactions between carbohydrates and synthetic lectins through variable temperature Nuclear Magnetic Resonance titrations
details: Applied new mathematical models for ligand-host systems to quantitatively determine the association constants between carbohydrates and synthetic lectins using Microsoft Excel

Analyzed results using Microsoft Excel by applying new mathematical models for ligand-host systems to determine quantitatively the association constants between the carbohydrates and synthetic lectins
Modeled the motion of chemically propelled nanorods using Java and AWT Graphics
Illustrated chemistry and instrumentation using Autodesk 3ds Max
